name: Upside Slimin'
description:
Upside Slimin' is a 2D endless runner. Blob runs through the ups & downs of life, losing and collecting pieces of himself.

This game was submitted to My First Game Jam in July 2021, which was indeed my first game jam. Developed solely by Felipe Mello over the course of two weeks.

WebGL build currently not working properly. May add one later.

Music by: Primal Light on OpenGameArt.org

Death/Hitting Ground Sound Effect by: Random User on OpenGameArt.org

Jumping Sound Effect by Blender Foundation / Lamoot on OpenGameArt.org

Power Up Effect by: by jalastram on OpenGameArt.org

8-bit Arcade Font by: Damien Gosset on dafont.com
